name: Lavina
content:
Lavina was a Human female smuggler who operated outside the Orphaned Marauder's Cave on the Forest moon of Endor during the Galactic Civil War.
Lavina was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Lavina was added to the game along with the smuggling missions introduced with the "Chapter 3" update, released on September 27, 2006.
